webAppOS google_scopes web service and driver

This web service:
  • provides the Google login button for webAppOS
  • provides the Google drive driver for mounting Google drive as a subidrectory within webAppOS user's home directory

How to use

The webAppOS login app (Login.webapp) will automatically detect google_scopes web service and will display the Google login button. To log in with the ability to mount Google drive, check the "with Google drive" checkbox; then use the mount app (mount.webapp) to configure the mount point (the directory must exist in the user's home file system - you can create it using the FileBrowser app).

How to configure

If you are the webAppOS administrator, find the instructions on how to register webAppOS within Google and how to obtain Google keys here.
